name: Grammarly
description: Grammarly is an AI-powered writing assistant that enhances writing quality through grammar, spelling, and style corrections across multiple platforms.
longDescription: Grammarly is an advanced AI writing assistant designed to improve English writing by correcting grammar, spelling, punctuation, and style issues. Founded in 2009 by Ukrainian entrepreneurs, it serves students, professionals, and businesses with tools to ensure clear and professional communication. The platform integrates seamlessly with over 500,000 apps and websites, offering real-time feedback to enhance writing quality. Its mission is to empower users to communicate effectively and confidently, whether drafting emails, essays, or business documents. Grammarly provides a free plan with basic features and premium plans for advanced capabilities, catering to individual and team needs. The tool also emphasizes data security, with third-party compliance certifications to protect user privacy.
features: Grammar and spelling checks correct errors in real-time, ensuring polished and professional writing.
Tone adjustments suggest changes to align writing with the intended audience and purpose.
Plagiarism detection scans content against billions of web pages to ensure originality.
Full-sentence rewrites enhance clarity and coherence with AI-powered suggestions.
Custom style guides maintain brand consistency for teams and organizations.
Integration with 500,000+ apps and websites allows seamless writing support across platforms like Google Docs and Microsoft Word.
Citation generator creates accurate APA, MLA, and Chicago-style citations for academic writing.
AI-powered prompts assist in generating content, outlines, or overcoming writer's block.

faqs.question: What is the difference between Grammarly Free and Grammarly Pro?
faqs.answer: Grammarly Free offers basic grammar, spelling, and tone detection with 100 AI prompts per month, while Grammarly Pro includes advanced features like full-sentence rewrites, plagiarism detection, and 2,000 AI prompts monthly.

faqs.question: Can Grammarly be used on multiple devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Grammarly works across devices via browser extensions, desktop apps, and mobile keyboards, supporting platforms like Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android.

faqs.question: Does Grammarly offer a plagiarism checker?
faqs.answer: Grammarly Pro includes a plagiarism checker that compares content against billions of web pages to ensure originality, ideal for students and professionals.

faqs.question: Is Grammarly secure for sensitive documents?
faqs.answer: Grammarly prioritizes data security with third-party compliance certifications and does not use sensitive user data for training or advertising purposes.

faqs.question: Can Grammarly help with academic writing?
faqs.answer: Yes, Grammarly supports academic writing with citation generation, essay checking, and suggestions tailored to academic tone and structure.

faqs.question: Does Grammarly offer team plans?
faqs.answer: Grammarly Pro supports teams of 1-149 users with features like style guides and team management, while Enterprise plans cater to larger organizations with custom pricing.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial for Grammarly Pro?
faqs.answer: Grammarly does not consistently offer a free trial for Pro, but occasional 7-day trials may be available on their website.
